headline: Bekaert - Update on the Share Buyback Program and Liquidity Agreement
summary: Update on the Share Buyback Program and the Liquidity Agreement Period from 15 January 2026 to 21 January 2026 Share Buyback ProgramOn 21 November 2025, Bekaert announced the start of the next tranche of its share buyback program, for a total maximum consideration of up to € 25 million. As announced previously, the purpose of the Program is to cancel all shares repurchased. Bekaert announces today that during the period from 15 January 2026 to 21 January 2026, Kepler Cheuvreux SA on behalf of Be

headline: OSB GROUP PLC - Transaction in Own Shares
summary: OSB GROUP PLC ISIN: GB00BLDRH36023 January 2026 LEI number: 213800ZBKL9BHSL2K459 OSB GROUP PLC (the “Company”) Transaction in Own Shares The Company announces that on 22 January 2026 it had purchased a total of 91,299 of its ordinary shares of £0.01 each (the "ordinary shares") on the London Stock Exchange, CBOE BXE and CBOE CXE, through the Company's broker Citigroup Global Markets Limited as detailed below. The repurchased ordinary shares will be cancelled. London Stock ExchangeCBOE BXECBOE CX

headline: How The Updated Price Target Shapes The Cboe Global Markets (CBOE) Investment Story
summary: The price target on Cboe Global Markets has been updated from an unspecified prior level to a new figure that reflects a reassessment of its risk and return profile. This shift in target focuses solely on how the stock is now being framed by the latest narrative, rather than on any valuation multiples or profitability metrics. Stay with this article to see how you can keep track of these narrative changes as they continue to develop. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Cboe Global Markets...
